content: kanteletar design tiina kuu photos tiina rammo and tiina kuu kanteletar is a collection of finnish folk poetry it s considered to be the sister collection to the finnish national epic kalevala the kanteletar sock pattern is the closing sequel to my trilogy of traditional karelia-inspired sock patterns including also echoes from karelia and sydämeni laulu song of my heart this is a
